full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 07/29/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1204 1202 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 806 807 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 707 708 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1237 1236 8:30- 9:00 AM 837 837 4:30-5:00 PM 737 738 1:00-1:30 AM 162 167 9:00-9:30 AM 914 915 5:00 -5:30 PM 511 512 1:30-2:00 AM 132 138 9:30-10:00 AM 948 946 5:30-6:00 PM 544 542 2:00-2:30 AM 204 206 10:00-10:30 AM 1012 1013 6:00-6:30 PM 613 614 2:30-3:00 AM 231 238 10:30-11:00 AM 1044 1045 6:30-7:00 PM 639 640 3:00-3:30 AM 302 304 11:00-11:30 AM 1106 1107 7:00-7:30 PM 707 708 3:30-4:00 AM 331 338 11:30-12:00 AM 1137 1138 7:30-8:00 PM 739 740 4:00-4:30 AM 404 406 12:00-12:30 PM 1203 1204 8:00-8:30 PM 905 906 4:30-5:00 AM 434 436 12:30- 1:00 PM 1227 1228 8:30- 9:00 PM 940 941 5:00 -5:30 AM 537 538 1:00-1:30 PM 125 128 9:00-9:30 PM 921 922 5:30-6:00 AM 631 633 1:30-2:00 PM 148 149 9:30-10:00 PM 934 934 6:00-6:30 AM 606 607 2:00-2:30 PM 203 204 10:00-10:30 PM 1016 1017 6:30-7:00 AM 634 638 2:30-3:00 PM 233 234 10:30-11:00 PM 1030 1037 7:00-7:30 AM 702 703 3:00-3:30 PM 331 11:00-11:30 PM 1111 1115 7:30-8:00 AM 736 736 3:30-4:00 PM 336 339 11:30-12:00 PM 1134 1134 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 07/29/2019
TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in a table format, with some redacted information marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'. The document appears to be a 30-minute check sheet for inmates in a special housing unit.
